Abilities.name: Surge Surfer (hidden ability)
Abilities.derciption-Abilities: Doubles the Pokémon’s Speed stat on Electric Terrain.

Abilities.name: Poison Touch
Abilities.derciption-Abilities: May poison targets when a Pokémon makes contact

Abilities.name: Gluttony Power of Alchemy (hidden ability)
Abilities.derciption-Abilities: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally

Abilities.name: Gluttony Power of Alchemy (hidden ability)
Abilities.derciption-Abilities: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally

Abilities.name: Sand Veil(can use outside battle)
Abilities.derciption-Abilities: Boosts the Pokémon’s evasion in a sandstorm.

Abilities.name: Tangling Hair Sand Force (hidden ability)
Abilities.derciption-Abilities: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s Speed stat.

Abilities.name: Sand Veil(can use outside battle)
Abilities.derciption-Abilities: Boosts the Pokémon’s evasion in a sandstorm.

Abilities.name: Tangling Hair Sand Force (hidden ability)
Abilities.derciption-Abilities: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s Speed stat.

Abilities.name: Cursed Body
Abilities.derciption-Abilities: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.

Abilities.name: Lightning Rod Rock Head (hidden ability)
Abilities.derciption-Abilities: Lightning Rod forces all single-target Electric-type moves - used by any other Pokémon on the field - to target this Pokémon, and with 100% accuracy. This includes the status move Thunder Wave.

Abilities.name: Magnet Pull
Abilities.derciption-Abilities: Magnet Pull prevents Steel type Pokémon from switching out of battle or fleeing.

Abilities.name: Sturdy Galvanize (hidden ability)
Abilities.derciption-Abilities: Sturdy allows the Pokémon to survive with 1 HP if attacked at full HP with an attack that would otherwise knock it out. It also prevents One-Hit-KO moves (Fissure, Horn Drill, Guillotine or Sheer Cold).

Abilities.name: Magnet Pull
Abilities.derciption-Abilities: Magnet Pull prevents Steel type Pokémon from switching out of battle or fleeing.

Abilities.name: Gluttony
Abilities.derciption-Abilities: Makes the Pokémon use a held Berry earlier than usual.

Abilities.name: Hustle (can use outside battle)
Abilities.derciption-Abilities: Hustle increases the ability-bearer's Attack by 50%, however, it also reduces the Accuracy of all Physical moves by 20%.

Abilities.name: Thick Fat  (hidden ability)
Abilities.derciption-Abilities: Thick Fat reduces the damage taken from Fire-type and Ice-type moves by 50%.

Abilities.name: Gluttony

Abilities.name: Hustle (can use outside battle)
Abilities.derciption-Abilities: Hustle increases the ability-bearer's Attack by 50%, however, it also reduces the Accuracy of all Physical moves by 20%.

Abilities.name: Thick Fat  (hidden ability)
Abilities.derciption-Abilities: Thick Fat reduces the damage taken from Fire-type and Ice-type moves by 50%.

Abilities.name: Pickup (can use outside battle)
Abilities.derciption-Abilities: When another Pokémon on the field uses a single-use held item, a Pokémon with Pickup will obtain the used item (if they are not already holding anything) and it can be used again.

Abilities.name: Technician
Abilities.derciption-Abilities: Technician increases the power of moves - that are usually base power 60 or below - by 50%.

Abilities.name: Rattled (hidden ability)
Abilities.derciption-Abilities: When a Pokémon with Rattled is hit by a Bug, Ghost or Dark type move, its Speed is raised one stage (up to the usual maximum of +6 stages).

Abilities.name: Fur Coat
Abilities.derciption-Abilities: Fur Coat reduces damage taken from physical attacks by 50%.

Abilities.name: Technician

Abilities.name: Rattled (hidden ability)
Abilities.derciption-Abilities: When a Pokémon with Rattled is hit by a Bug, Ghost or Dark type move, its Speed is raised one stage (up to the usual maximum of +6 stages).

Abilities.name: Snow Cloak
Abilities.derciption-Abilities: Snow Cloak raises ability-bearer's evasion by 20% in a hail storm. It also gives immunity to damage by hail (if they are not already protected by being Ice type).

Abilities.name: Slush Rush (hidden ability)
Abilities.derciption-Abilities: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a hailstorm.

Abilities.name: Snow Cloak
Abilities.derciption-Abilities: Snow Cloak raises ability-bearer's evasion by 20% in a hail storm. It also gives immunity to damage by hail (if they are not already protected by being Ice type).

Abilities.name: Snow Cloak

Abilities.name: Snow Warning (hidden ability)
Abilities.derciption-Abilities: Snow Warning creates a hailstorm when the ability-bearer enters battle. The effect lasts 5 turns, unless it is cleared via Air Lock or Cloud Nine or replaced by another weather condition.

Abilities.name: Snow Cloak

Abilities.name: Snow Warning (hidden ability)
Abilities.derciption-Abilities: Snow Warning creates a hailstorm when the ability-bearer enters battle. The effect lasts 5 turns, unless it is cleared via Air Lock or Cloud Nine or replaced by another weather condition.

Abilities.name: Frisk
Abilities.derciption-Abilities: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.

Abilities.name: Harvest (hidden ability)
Abilities.derciption-Abilities: May create another Berry after one is used.
